EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_11/12/13Launch_Q413.CF Follow Up
EmailTemplate.subject: Watch the Replay: Delivering Pivotal One
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Pivotal Introduces Pivotal One, The World's First Next-Generation Multi-Cloud Enterprise PaaS
Today's webcast announced the launch of Pivotal One™ — a comprehensive, multi-cloud Enterprise PaaS comprised of a set of application and data services that run on top of Pivotal CF™, the leading enterprise distribution of the Cloud Foundry™ platform.
Watch the replay <http://www.gopivotal.com> — Delivering Pivotal One
What is Pivotal One?
Deliver and Update Applications at Velocity and Scale:
- Pivotal CF Elastic Runtime Service - Pivotal CF Operations Manager
Pivotal One Services:
- Pivotal HD Service - Pivotal AX Service - Pivotal RabbitMQ Service - Pivotal MySQL Service
Learn more... <http://www.gopivotal.com/paas>
Check out Pivotal P.O.V. Visit Our Blog >> <http://blog.gopivotal.com/>
What's New at Pivotal? Read Now >> <http://www.gopivotal.com/resources>
Follow Us: Twitter <http://www.twitter.com/gopivotal> | LinkedIn <http://www.linkedin.com/company/gopivotal> | Facebook <http://www.facebook.com/gopivotal> | Google+ <https://plus.google.com/105320112436428794490>
